parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.
parameters.name: X-Avi-Version

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: Default values are not set.
parameters.name: skip_default

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid
parameters.name: refers_to

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid
parameters.name: referred_by

shared_ssl_certificates.description: SSL Certificates in the admin tenant can be used in non-admin tenants. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

cluster_ip_gratuitous_arp_period.description: Period for cluster ip gratuitous arp job.

persistence_key_rotate_period.description: Period for rotate app persistence keys job. Allowed values are 1-1051200. Special values are 0 - 'Disabled'.

bm_use_ansible.description: Use Ansible for SE creation in baremetal. Field introduced in 17.2.2.

portal_token.description: Token used for uploading tech-support to portal. Field introduced in 16.4.6,17.1.2.

max_pcap_per_tenant.description: Maximum number of pcap files stored per tenant.

enable_memory_balancer.description: Enable/Disable Memory Balancer. Field introduced in 17.2.8.

seupgrade_fabric_pool_size.description: Pool size used for all fabric commands during se upgrade.

cleanup_expired_authtoken_timeout_period.description: Period for auth token cleanup job. Field introduced in 18.1.1.

vs_key_rotate_period.description: Period for rotate VS keys job. Allowed values are 1-1051200. Special values are 0 - 'Disabled'.

seupgrade_segroup_min_dead_timeout.description: Time to wait before marking segroup upgrade as stuck.

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

warmstart_vs_resync_wait_time.description: Timeout for warmstart VS resync. Field introduced in 18.1.4, 18.2.1.

vs_apic_scaleout_timeout.description: Time to wait for the scaled out SE to become ready before marking the scaleout done, applies to APIC configuration only.

process_pki_profile_timeout_period.description: Period for process PKI profile job. Field introduced in 18.1.1.

upgrade_dns_ttl.description: Time to account for DNS TTL during upgrade. This is in addition to vs_scalein_timeout_for_upgrade in se_group. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

dns_refresh_period.description: Period for refresh pool and gslb DNS job.

api_perf_logging_threshold.description: Threshold to log request timing in portal_performance.log and Server-Timing response header. Any stage taking longer than 1% of the threshold will be included in the Server-Timing header. Field introduced in 18.1.4, 18.2.1.

vs_se_attach_ip_fail.description: Time to wait before marking attach IP operation on an SE as failed. Field introduced in 17.2.2.

allow_unauthenticated_nodes.description: Placeholder for description of property allow_unauthenticated_nodes of obj type ControllerProperties field type str  type boolean

allow_unauthenticated_apis.description: Allow unauthenticated access for special APIs.

vs_scaleout_ready_check_interval.description: Interval for checking scaleout_ready status while controller is waiting for ScaleOutReady RPC from the Service Engine. Field introduced in 18.2.2.

safenet_hsm_version.description: Version of the safenet package installed on the controller. Field introduced in 16.5.2,17.2.3.

se_from_marketplace.description: This setting decides whether SE is to be deployed from the cloud marketplace or to be created by the controller. The setting is applicable only when BYOL license is selected. Enum options - MARKETPLACE, IMAGE. Field introduced in 18.1.4, 18.2.1.

process_locked_useraccounts_timeout_peri.description: Period for process locked user accounts job. Field introduced in 18.1.1.

consistency_check_timeout_period.description: Period for consistency check job. Field introduced in 18.1.1.

uuid.description: Unique object identifier of the object.

max_seq_attach_ip_failures.description: Maximum number of consecutive attach IP failures that halts VS placement. Field introduced in 17.2.2.

cleanup_sessions_timeout_period.description: Period for sessions cleanup job. Field introduced in 18.1.1.

secure_channel_cleanup_timeout.description: Period for secure channel cleanup job.

ssl_certificate_expiry_warning_days.description: Number of days for SSL Certificate expiry warning.

cloud_reconcile.description: Enable/Disable periodic reconcile for all the clouds. Field introduced in 17.2.14,18.1.5,18.2.1.

appviewx_compat_mode.description: Export configuration in appviewx compatibility mode. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

enable_api_sharding.description: This setting enables the controller leader to shard API requests to the followers (if any). Field introduced in 18.1.5, 18.2.1.

se_failover_attempt_interval.description: Interval between attempting failovers to an SE.

poll_duration_target.description: Discovery poll target duration; a scale factor of 1+ is computed with the actual discovery (actual/target) and used to tweak slow and fast poll intervals.

vnic_retries_delay.description: Delay between each vnic status poll check.

async_retries.description: Maximum polls to check for async jobs to finish.

async_retries_delay.description: Delay between each async job status poll check.

vnic_retries.description: Maximum polls to check for vnics to be attached to VM.

info.description: Properties specific to a cloud type.

uuid.description: Unique object identifier of the object.

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

cc_vtypes.description: Cloud types supported by CloudConnector. Enum options - CLOUD_NONE, CLOUD_VCENTER, CLOUD_OPENSTACK, CLOUD_AWS, CLOUD_VCA, CLOUD_APIC, CLOUD_MESOS, CLOUD_LINUXSERVER, CLOUD_DOCKER_UCP, CLOUD_RANCHER, CLOUD_OSHIFT_K8S, CLOUD_AZURE, CLOUD_GCP.

max_ip6s_per_nic.description: Maximum number of IPv6 addresses that can be configured per NIC. Field introduced in 18.1.1.

meta.description: Placeholder for description of property meta of obj type CloudFlavor field type str  type object

is_recommended.description: If a vm flavor is recommended for requested se_usage_type.Set to True if the chosen VM flavor is recommended for requested se_usage_type.Else set to False. Field introduced in 18.1.4, 18.2.1.

public.description: Placeholder for description of property public of obj type CloudFlavor field type str  type boolean

enhanced_nw.description: Placeholder for description of property enhanced_nw of obj type CloudFlavor field type str  type boolean

htype.description: Enum options - DEFAULT, VMWARE_ESX, KVM, VMWARE_VSAN, XEN.

flavor_props.description: Flavor properties specific to this cloud type.

vtype.description: Cloud type. Enum options - CLOUD_NONE, CLOUD_VCENTER, CLOUD_OPENSTACK, CLOUD_AWS, CLOUD_VCA, CLOUD_APIC, CLOUD_MESOS, CLOUD_LINUXSERVER, CLOUD_DOCKER_UCP, CLOUD_RANCHER, CLOUD_OSHIFT_K8S, CLOUD_AZURE, CLOUD_GCP.

htypes.description: Supported hypervisors. Enum options - DEFAULT, VMWARE_ESX, KVM, VMWARE_VSAN, XEN.

controller_props.description: Controller properties specific to this cloud type.

cca_props.description: CloudConnectorAgent properties specific to this cloud type.
